data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
Montreal will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Vancouver.
In the minute 2, Throw-in for Montreal close to the penalty box.
Montreal's Romell Quioto is on target but unsuccessful.
Lucas Cavallini (Vancouver) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
In the minute 5, Drew Fischer awards Montreal a goal kick.
Drew Fischer signals a free kick to Montreal in their own half.
Free kick for Vancouver in their own half.
In the minute 7, Montreal awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Montreal's Victor Wanyama breaks free at Saputo Stadium. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 10, It's a goal kick for the away team in Montreal.
Free kick Vancouver.
Free kick for Vancouver in the half of Montreal.
In the minute 13, Vancouver to take a throw-in in Montreal territory.
Throw-in high up the field for Montreal in Montreal.
Corner awarded to Montreal.
In the minute 15, Victor Wanyama (Montreal) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Montreal have been awarded a corner by Drew Fischer.
Luis Binks (Montreal) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 16, Montreal drive upfield and Samuel Piette gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Vancouver defender.
Goal! Montreal have taken a 1-0 lead courtesy of a header from Romell Quioto.
Saphir Taider instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 19, It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Vancouver close to the penalty box.
Corner awarded to Montreal.
Vancouver awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 25, Can Vancouver get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Montreal's half?
Can Vancouver capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Montreal's half?
Drew Fischer signals a Vancouver throw-in in Montreal's half.
In the minute 27, Romell Quioto of Montreal smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Free kick for Montreal in their own half.
Montreal's Saphir Taider gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 31, Vancouver have a goal kick.
Throw-in for Vancouver in the half of Montreal.
Throw-in for Montreal in their own half.
In the minute 33, Drew Fischer signals a free kick to Vancouver.
Michael Baldisimo for Vancouver gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Montreal goal kick.
In the minute 35, Drew Fischer signals a free kick to Montreal in their own half.
Vancouver awarded a free kick in their own half.
Vancouver awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 37, Goal kick for Montreal at Saputo Stadium.
Vancouver are caught offside.
Lassi Lappalainen puts the ball in the net and the home team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 2-0.
In the minute 40, Maciel with an assist there.
Free kick for Montreal in their own half.
Drew Fischer awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 45, The first-half is over.
Drew Fischer has blown to start the second-half.
Drew Fischer signals a free kick to Montreal in their own half.
Leonard Owusu is on a sub for Patrick Metcalfe for Vancouver.
In the minute 46, Marc Dos Santos (Vancouver) is making a first substitution, with Jake Nerwinski replacing Ranko Veselinovic.
In Montreal Vancouver attack through Leonard Owusu. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 47, Montreal have a goal kick.
In Montreal a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Drew Fischer awards Montreal a goal kick.
In the minute 50, Vancouver have a dangerous throw-in.
Vancouver have been awarded a corner by Drew Fischer.
Vancouver's Derek Cornelius gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Montreal defender.
In the minute 51, Vancouver have been awarded a penalty...
Vancouver drives forward and Lucas Cavallini gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Lucas Cavallini for Vancouver gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 52, Drew Fischer awards Vancouver a penalty but Lucas Cavallini misses from 12 yards.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Montreal.
In the minute 55, Vancouver have been awarded a corner by Drew Fischer.
Ball goes out of play for a Montreal goal kick.
The home team replace Saphir Taider with Maximiliano Urruti.
Vancouver needs to be cautious. Montreal have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 57, Can Montreal get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Vancouver's half?
Vancouver to take a throw-in in Montreal territory.
Maximiliano Urruti of Montreal gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 59, Goal kick for Vancouver at Saputo Stadium.
Vancouver's Jake Nerwinski is whistled for offside at Saputo Stadium.
Vancouver awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 62, Ryan Raposo is replacing Michael Baldisimo for Vancouver at Saputo Stadium.
Drew Fischer signals a free kick to Vancouver in their own half.
Throw-in Montreal.
Ball safe as Montreal is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 66, Drew Fischer signals a Vancouver throw-in in Montreal's half.
In the minute 66, The home team have replaced Lassi Lappalainen with Orji Okwonkwo. This is the second substitution made today by Thierry Henry.
Marc Dos Santos is making the team's fourth substitution at Saputo Stadium with Yordy Reyna replacing Cristian Dajome.
In Montreal Montreal drive forward through Orji Okwonkwo. His shot is on target but it's saved.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 69, In Montreal a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Vancouver attack but Derek Cornelius's header doesn't find the target.
Drew Fischer awards Montreal a goal kick.
In the minute 70, Throw-in for Vancouver in the half of Montreal.
Montreal have a goal kick.
Free kick Montreal.
In the minute 73, Corner awarded to Montreal.
Montreal have been awarded a corner by Drew Fischer.
In Montreal, Victor Wanyama of Montreal is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 75, Can Vancouver get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Montreal's half?
Free kick for Vancouver in the half of Montreal.
Marc Dos Santos is making the team's fifth substitution at Saputo Stadium with Tosaint Ricketts replacing David Milinkovic.
In the minute 78, Drew Fischer signals a free kick to Vancouver just outside Montreal's area.
Throw-in for Montreal at Saputo Stadium.
Anthony Jackson-Hamel is replacing Romell Quioto for the home team.
In the minute 80, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Free kick for Vancouver in their own half.
Drew Fischer signals a free kick to Montreal.
At Saputo Stadium, Anthony Jackson-Hamel has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 86, Vancouver's Derek Cornelius has been booked in Montreal.
Anthony Jackson-Hamel (Montreal) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
In the minute 87, Ball goes out of play for a Vancouver goal kick.
At Saputo Stadium, Vancouver are penalized for being offside.
Corner awarded to Montreal.
Montreal awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Vancouver in the half of Montreal.
7 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Montreal.
Free kick for Montreal in their own half.
Throw-in for Vancouver in their own half.
Vancouver surge into the attack at Saputo Stadium but Yordy Reynaâ€™s header is off-target.
Goal kick for Montreal at Saputo Stadium.
Vancouver advance rapidly upfield but Drew Fischer blows for offside.
Free kick Vancouver.
Drew Fischer signals a free kick to Vancouver in their own half.
Vancouver to take a throw-in in Montreal territory.
Vancouver pushes forward through Ali Adnan, whose finish on goal is saved.
Important block from the Montreal defence as Tosaint Ricketts fires in a strike for Vancouver.
The match is over. Final score 2-0.
